extension.description: EXPerimental plugin that lets you play music from Youtube Music.
extension.news: 1.0~beta20 (2023-12-04) - Fix an issue introduced in in 1.0~~beta18 that caused the 'search' context menu option to fail - Re-enable context menu option to mark songs as thumbs up / down (liked / disliked) - Update ytmusicapi to version `1.3.2` - Added experimental feature to add songs to the YT library or remove them (depending on availability of feedback tokens) - Added setting to control automatic reloading of the YT library after adding a song
